name: PatientTransferredToAnotherCareSetting
title: Patient Transferred to Another Care Setting
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains SNOMEDCT codes associated with transfer to other care settings.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are transferred from the hospital to other care settings. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the "Transfer To" element.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set includes SNOMEDCT codes associated with patient transfer to another health care facility (e.g., skilled nursing facility).),(Exclusion Criteria: Discharge codes or intra-hospital transfer codes are not included in this value set.)
